page.title: 13LEISURE
page.content: There is a variety of different clubs to suit many ages in Ewyas Harold. The {Mother and Toddler}club was formed in 1980 and is held in the{Memorial Hall on Wednesday mornings. The{church organises{Wednesday clubs}for schoolchildren, called{Climbers, {Explorers and Adventurers,}where they do a variety of interesting things. There are{Brownie and Guide}groups held in the old school. There is a {badminton}club in the Memorial Hall and the{Football}and{Cricket}clubs play their{Herefordshire league matches on the village{playing fields. There is also the{Evergreens}club for the{over-60's.
